articles.title: Nvidia Stock Is ‘Ripe’ for Gains in 2026, According to This Top Analyst
articles.mainIdea: Nvidia Stock Is ‘Ripe’ for Gains in 2026, According to This Top Analyst
articles.summary: Barchart: Nvidia Stock Is ‘Ripe’ for Gains in 2026, According to This Top Analyst. Nvidia has lost some shine in 2025. But as AI fears cool, Cantor Fitzgerald sees the weakness as temporary, calling the stock a top pick for 2026. Related tickers mentioned: NVDA.
